item.title: Theiving Stall Help 317 PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

yes, i removed the void public theifstall and compiled than got 100 errors, that didnt work so i put the original back in and added that and i get

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

    if (theifTimer == 0) {
        if (playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
            setAnimation(emote);
            sendMessage("You steal from the " + stallName);
            sendMessage(message);
            addItem(item, itemAmount);
            addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
            theifTimer = delay;
        } else if (playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need a theiving level of " + lvlReq
                    + " to theif from this stall.");

here is how it looks

}
}
public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(emote);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sM(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

    if (theifTimer == 0) {
        if (playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
            setAnimation(emote);
            sendMessage("You steal from the " + stallName);
            sendMessage(message);
            addItem(item, itemAmount);
            addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
            theifTimer = delay;
        } else if (playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need a theiving level of " + lvlReq
                    + " to theif from this stall.");

        }
    }

I dont know if thats how you wanted me to insert, but thats how i did it.
I checked and all i can still do is just walk up to the stall. I did get the “choose the firemaking skill” and when i clicked nothing happened after that.
Im sorry this is so difficult, but its pretty important to me. Thanks for your help!!

item.title: Theiving Stall Help 317 PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Try:

case 2562; { TheifStall("gem stall", "and receive 250,000 gold.", 80, 7000*playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 0x340); } case 2560; { TheifStall("silk stall", "and receive 50,000 gold.", 1, 600*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } case 2565; { TheifStall("silver stall", "and receive 100,000 gold.", 50, 1050*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340); }

If that doesnt work search for TheifStall() or public void TheifStall

If it is there or if it doesnt exist, add or replace with

[code] public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

    if (theifTimer == 0) {
        if (playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
            setAnimation(emote);
            sendMessage("You steal from the " + stallName);
            sendMessage(message);
            addItem(item, itemAmount);
            addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
            theifTimer = delay;
        } else if (playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need a theiving level of " + lvlReq
                    + " to theif from this stall.");
        }
    }
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving Stall Help 317 PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

ok, so im stumped. Ive worked on this for hours, and i cant figure it out. Im just learning how to code also so that doesnt help, but here is the thing.

My home is in edge and im trying to get some theiving stall on the left side of the bank, well when i got that finished i was relieved, well now when i click on them nothing happens, my char walks to them and thats it, i dont know if you need these but here they are

if(objectID == 5585){
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){
actionInterval = 15000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
addItem(1947, 1);
setAnimation(827);
}
}
if(objectID == 2562){
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and receive 250,000 gold.”, 80, 7000playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2560){
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “and receive 50,000 gold.”, 1, 600playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2565){
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and receive 100,000 gold.”, 50, 1050*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340);
}
}

AND THE NEXT ONE

makeGlobalObject(3100, 3505, 2560, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3100, 3501, 2565, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3097, 3503, 2562, 0, 10);

Thank you in advance for your help!

bump
